newsitem.title: EU: EP EXTERNAL COMMITTEE AGENDA - OCT 22.
newsitem.headline: EP EXTERNAL COMMITTEE AGENDA - OCT 22.

text.p: Committee on External Economic Relations [[ Tuesday 22 October 1996 ]] PUBLIC MEETING 1. Adoption of draft agenda (PE219.451 ) 2. Chairman's announcements ===] In the presence of the Council and Commission 3. Protection against effects of application of certain third-country legislati on (Helms-Burton Act) (T04951) CNS96217 COM(96)0420 C4-0519/96 + RELA Fond R KITTELMANN Peter. (PPE) (PE218.828/A ) - Adoption of draft report 4. Future financing of the European Union in respect of enlargement (T04589) (T04589) INI0445 INI0445 + RELA Avis A WIERSMA Jan M. (PSE) (PE218.821 ) F BUDG Fond R CHRISTODOULOU Efthym (PPE) (PE218.268/RV1) - Adoption of draft opinion 5. Implementation of the action plan annexed to the Barcelona Declaration (T04510) COS0436 7987/96 C4-0414/96 + RELA Avis A DIMITRAKOPOULOS Geor (PPE) F POLI Fond R SAKELLARIOU Jannis. (PSE) (PE218.799/A ) - Exchange of views 6. Any other business 7. Date of next meeting (PE/VI/OJ/96-23 ) - FIN - END OF DOCUMENT.
